pages.text: $(weapon)Execute$() deals $(important)massive bonus damage$() to enemies below a certain health threshold!$(br2)Perfect for finishing off wounded foes with devastating final blows.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: When an enemy is below $(important)20% health$(), Execute activates and deals bonus damage based on level.$(br2)$(li)Level 1: +50% damage when low HP$(li)Higher levels: Even more bonus damage!$(br2)Great for finishing bosses and tanks.

pages.title: Synergies
pages.text: $(li)Pair with $(weapon)Sharpness$() to reach execute threshold faster$(li)Use with $(weapon)Critical Strike$() for explosive finishers$(li)Combine with $(weapon)Poison$() to whittle health down$(li)Essential for boss rushes$(br2)$(o)"Finish him!"$()
